name: Google
blurb: Located in the heart of the historic docklands district (a.k.a. Silicon Dock), Google has helped put Dublin on the map as a technology hub in Europe, thanks, in part, to our awesome teams of software engineers, account managers, digital strategists and others. Our office is made up of thousands of Googlers from over 65 countries, overseeing sales and infrastructure for our businesses in Europe, the Middle East and Africa.
